titleStmt.title: SII 7.880: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 880. (A.R. No. 252 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumakaḷ polap perunilaic celviyum n=taṉakke Urimai pūṇṭamai maṉakkoḷak kāṉn=taḷurcālai kalamaṟuttaruḷi veṅkaiṉāṭum kaṅkapāṭiyum
nuḷampapāṭiyum n=taṭikaivaḻiyum kuṭamalaināṭum kollamum kaliṅkamum Eṇṭicai pukaḻtara Īḻamaṇṭalamum Iraṭṭapāṭi Eḻaraiilakkamum n=ti
ṇṭiṟal veṉṟi taṇṭāṟ koṇṭu taṉneḻil vaḷaruḻiyūḻiyu ḷellā viyāṇṭu n=toḻutakai viḷaṅkum yāṇṭe ceḻiyarait tecukoḷ śrīkovirāja
rājakecaripanmarāna śrīrājarājadevaṟkku yāṇṭu Irupattoṉpatāvatu śrījayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu milāṭāna jaṉanātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu
tirukkovalūr tiruviraṭṭānamuṭaiya mātevar pacu nūṟṟaimpatu cāvā muvāp perumpacuvāka Ippacu nūṟṟaimpatuṅ koṇṭu pacu Oṉṟukku pālāḻākkāka nicatam pāl patakki
runāḻi muḻākkup pāl Uccampotu pālāṭiyaruḷa cantrādittaval Aṭṭakkaṭava Iṭaiyar tāṉṟi vāñciravaṉum nampūraṉ kiraṉum vaikun=taṉ muḷḷiyum kān=ta ṉ Aṇṇāmuṭi Ivviṭaiyar nā
lvarkkum puṇai Ikkūṟṟattu brahmadeyam tirukkovalūr sabhaiyārum Ikkūṟṟattu brahmadeyañ ciṟṟiṅkūr sabhaiyārum Ikkūṟṟattu brahmadeyam Akkaḷamallaccaturvve
timaṅkalattu sabhaiyārum Ikkūṟṟattu marutūr Ūrārum Ittiruviraṭṭāṉamuṭaiya mahaādevar tiruvuṇṇāḻikai sabhaiyāraṉaivarum Idevark=ku nittal nivan=tañ ceyyakkaṭava Iṭaiya raṉaivarum Ipparicu ni
catam patakkkirunāḻi muḻak=kup pāl cantrādittaval Aṭṭuvikkakkaṭavārkaḷ Ivai panmāheśvara rakṣai Ivai rakṣippār śrīpāta n=talai melaṉa . pālik=kuṅ kovalūr ciṟṟiṅkūr marutūrpati mallam patiṟṟup pattoṭu
patiṟṟaiñcāṉa kālik=kup puṇaiyākat tiruvuṇṇāḻikaiyār kaikkoṇṭu kaṟavai Oṉṟā lāḻākkāṅ kaṇak=kuk kolik koḷ pāl patineṇṇāḻi muḻak=ku k=koval viraṭṭark=ku mañcaṉamāṭa k=kuṭuttāṉ velikkoṉ tiṟaṟ k=kam
paṉ viṟal vītiviṭaṅkaṉ ven=tarpirā ṉarumoḻik=ku viṇṇappañ ceyte .
Digital edition of SII 7.880 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
